Name: Sports played
Description: This is a compound-value type that holds information about sports played by athletes.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The date after which this athlete no longer played this sport.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The date on which this athlete began to play this sport.

Properties.Name: Sport
Properties.Description: A sport this athlete has played.

Properties.Name: Athlete
Properties.Description: An athlete who has played this sport.
